author: Grace Vallo
title: Mom's Homemade Strawberry Preserves
ingredients: 4 packed cups fresh strawberries (hulled & cut in half)
instructions_list: Mash strawberries in a medium pot with a potato masher to desired consistency. I like some large pieces of strawberries and others that are completely mashed.
Stir in lemon juice, sugar, and salt.
Bring mixture to a boil over high heat. Once boiling, turn heat to medium and add cornstarch mixed with cold water. Stir. Let simmer over medium heat for 7 minutes, stirring every minute.
Remove from heat, and let preserves cool in a large bowl at room temperature for 30 minutes before cooling completely in the refrigerator.
Once cooled, transfer preserves to mason jars or other airtight containers!
description: My mom showed me how to make her famous homemade strawberry preserves! The recipe is old-fashioned with an intense fresh strawberry flavor made from only a few ingredients.
